name: Hubris: A Machine's Halo
description:
For behind the scenes content, voting, and other perks. Join the Discord! https://discord.gg/5Qffgpd

The Corona Virus has mutated, turning the infected into zombie-like mutants. You've managed to find the lab that created the Corona Virus. Your informant is deep inside the compound, and has the cure. Infiltrate the compound, reach your informant, and save the world from quarantine!

WASD and Mouse Controls. Right click to interact.

Currently over 2,700 views and 400 downloads on Gamejolt.
